plot: For some, the only hope for survival is the generosity of a stranger. Volunteer Donor shares the story of Sarah and Samuel and how through the miracle of a bone marrow transplant...a life was saved.
title: Volunteer Donor
plot_es: For some, the only hope for survival is the generosity of a stranger. Volunteer Donor shares the story of Sarah and Samuel and how through the miracle of a bone marrow transplant...a life was saved.
plot_en: For some, the only hope for survival is the generosity of a stranger. Volunteer Donor shares the story of Sarah and Samuel and how through the miracle of a bone marrow transplant...a life was saved.
